name: chores-monorepo
description: Family Chores Management App - Full-stack monorepo

scripts.test:all: echo '🧪 Running all tests...' && pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: echo '🔧 Backend Tests:' && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.test:frontend: echo '🎨 Frontend Tests:' && pnpm --filter frontend test -- --watchAll=false --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:coverage: echo '📊 Test Coverage Reports:' && pnpm run test:coverage:backend && pnpm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: echo '🔧 Backend Coverage:' && pnpm --filter backend test -- --coverage
scripts.test:coverage:frontend: echo '🎨 Frontend Coverage:' && pnpm --filter frontend test -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter backend run typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend run typecheck
